A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Thrilling. I went in very skeptical from their bad reviews but left wondering why the heck everyone hates it. The best Star Wars since Empire and finally gives the franchise room to breathe on its own.\n The treatment of Luke wasn't misplaced at all\, in fact I thought it was quite logical and beautifuly tragic. Go back and watch the originals if you really remember Luke as some perfect dimigod.
